import './Profile.css' import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar' import Sidebar from '../../components/sidebar/Sidebar' import Feed from '../../components/feed/Feed' import Rightbar from '../../components/rightbar/Rightbar' import axios from 'axios' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' export default function Profile() { const [user, setUser] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchUser = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`/users?username=sav`) setUser(res.data) } fetchUser() }, []) return ( <>

{user.username}

{user.desc}
) }
